channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Shutdowns of cellphone internet links sweep Russia, further limiting already-stifled net freedom
An Owego restaurant owner was detained by ICE. The community raised $15K for his family
China's spy agency attacks foreign efforts to 'steal' rare earths
Got $1,000? 5 Stocks to Buy Now While They're On Sale
EU approves new Russia sanctions with lower oil price cap
7/16: The Takeout with Major Garrett
item.description: President Trump denies plan to fire Fed Chair Jerome Powell; Former Vice President Mike Pence joins The Takeout

item.title: 7/17: The Takeout with Major Garrett
item.description: President Trump diagnosed with vein condition; Former VP Pence says he’s “disappointed” by Trump’s “retribution” for January 6 riot prosecutions

item.title: Passenger arrested after allegedly trying to open exit door on SkyWest flight
item.description: A SkyWest flight landed in Cedar Rapids, Michigan, on Thursday evening due to an unruly passenger, according to authorities.

item.title: Democrats press Trump administration on US deal with El Salvador to detain migrants
item.description: The letter calls on officials to turn over any agreements between the U.S. and El Salvador regarding the detaining of migrants at the notorious CECOT ...

item.title: Man charged with hijacking plane, causing fighter jets to scramble
item.description: The Royal Canadian Mounted Police said Shaheer Cassim, 39, has been charged with hijacking, constituting terrorism, over the incident.

item.title: Trump wants Texas to redraw its congressional map. Here's what to know.
item.description: President Trump has said he wants a "simple redrawing" of Texas' congressional map where Republicans pick up five seats.

item.title: WATCH: AG Pam Bondi visits Alcatraz for briefing after Trump's order to reopen prison
item.description: Attorney General Pam Bondi visited Alcatraz on Thursday to assess the viability of reopening the infamous prison.

item.title: 7/15: The Takeout with Major Garrett
item.description: Attorney General Pam Bondi faces questions about handling of the Epstein files; Historic Washington, D.C., restaurant closing doors for renovations

item.title: WATCH: Committee advances former Trump attorney for key appeals court role
item.description: Democrats walked out of the Senate Judiciary Committee before Republicans voted to advance Pres. Trump's nomination of Emil Bove.

item.title: In win for Trump, House approves $9B in spending cuts -- including USAID cuts
item.description: Murkowski said on Wednesday that she still opposes the bill after voting on Tuesday against advancing it forward.

item.title: The rise of masked officers is controversial new ground in American life
Emails show DeSantis administration blindsided county officials with plans for ‘Alligator Alcatraz’
Here’s what to know about chronic venous insufficiency
item.description: Swollen legs led to President Donald Trump being diagnosed with what’s called chronic venous insufficiency.
